verses.verse: After <WG1161> two <WG1417> days <WG2250> was <WG2258> <WG5713> the feast of the passover <WG3957>, and <WG2532> of <WG3326> matzah <WG106>: and <WG2532> the chief Kohanim <WG749> and <WG2532> the scribes <WG1122> sought <WG2212> <WG5707> how <WG4459> they might take <WG2902> <WG5660> him <WG846> by <WG1722> craft <WG1388>, and put him to death <WG615> <WG5725>.
